channel.title: Blog on OrganGrinderrr
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on OrganGrinderrr

item.title: A Money Heist
item.description: What is perfect money heist, an operation that is stealth. no one even notice that they’ve been robbed.

item.title: A New Personality That Would Fight Back
item.description: Chapter 1: The Havoc family # Hugo was born and raised in a poor village. He has a psychotic family line, spanning across multiple generations. His whole childhood was full of crap. His parents would get into a fight every other day. Always felt like this family was a wrecking ship, at risk of sinking with each wave crashing fight. Despite his best efforts of screaming and yelling for help, nobody ever answered back.

item.title: A Sample Archlinux Dotfiles for Hackers
item.description: A little bit opinion on Linux distros # Ubuntu, Archlinux, Gentoo, NixOS, Qubes OS, Tails Personally I would kill Qubes and Tails already, rather than chosing a distro designed for a single purpose, I would rather chose a general purpose. As everything in qubes can be implemented in other general purpose systems. Qubes and Tails are not alien technologies. Using Qubes and tails in my humble opinion not doing you any good as it shouts out that you are special, or more than special.

item.title: Brain Tumor
item.description: My name is Shawn. Nearly 4 months ago, I became very slient, usually I talk more, not as laqucious but people notces my existence. This change of personality is all because of a brain Tumor. Doctor says half a year, tops, I will be gone. Hard to accept the truth, even now. worked all my life to get to this point, that is really tragic, my son just got a new born baby.

item.title: Some Rambling I
item.description: When someone write on their profile saying, they are a chaos lover, they listen to minor music. their tastes are really special. and that’s what makes them special. I dispite them. Not bcuz I’m really the one who is special. but bcuz Sometimes they just stuck in their poor logic. when you heard people say, why they always judge without knowing. I ask them, do you know what’s even worse? judge with knowing, or real judgement, that include judge in action, not only just saying it.
